summary: "The Twilight Zone" is an old American TV series that aired from 1959 to 1964. It's a mix of fantasy, science fiction, and horror, with each episode telling a different story. The stories are often strange and scary, and they usually have a surprising ending with a lesson. Rod Serling created the show and wrote most of the episodes. He also hosted it, introducing each story with a monologue. The show made the phrase "twilight zone" popular, meaning a strange or surreal experience. Many famous actors appeared on the show, some early in their careers.
title: The Twilight Zone (1959 TV series)
